title: [PyTorch] Dataloader should prefetch a specified number of samples
body_html:
Also the number of samples to prefetch may be bigger then one epoch.

I am currently working with small datasets (~500 samples) and a high batch size (64 - 128). This results in a large time for loading the first batch (~1 s) of each epoch where all later batches need about 10 ms.

body:
Also the number of samples to prefetch may be bigger then one epoch.

I am currently working with small datasets (~500 samples) and a high batch size (64 - 128). This results in a large time for loading the first batch (~1 s) of each epoch where all later batches need about 10 ms.
